title: Senior Fullstack Engineer - .Net/C# and Angular
description: We're looking for a highly skilled senior full-stack engineer (.NET/C# and Angular - bonus: Python) to join our small but mighty team. You will be responsible for developing our employer-facing web app and work alongside our existing engineering team and our founders. **Responsibilities** - Develop and maintain our web application and APIs, ensuring high performance and responsiveness - Manage and optimise container orchestration with Kubernetes (K8s) to streamline deployment and scaling of our applications - Create user-friendly, efficient, and visually appealing front-end interfaces - Implement best practices for code quality, security, and scalability - Continuously monitor and improve application performance and usability - Help foster a culture of technical excellence and collaborate with the team to improve software design # **Requirements** - Strong background in full-stack development, ideally in a startup - Deep customer empathy and passion for solving gnarly problems with tech - Strong proficiency in .NET/C# and Angular (bonus: Python) - Expertise in AWS cloud services (EKS, S3, CloudWatch) and familiarity with cloud architecture best practices - Solid understanding and practical experience with Kubernetes for container orchestration - Excellent problem-solving abilities and a detail-oriented mindset - Strong English communication skills and ability to work collaboratively in a team environment - ***Bonus:*** Experience with LLMs (OpenAI, Claude) and vector databases
